description: Registration for a custom packet payload. This type holds the negotiated preferredVersion of the payload to use, and the handler for it.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The field for the id record component.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The field for the type record component.

fields.name: handler
fields.description: The field for the handler record component.

fields.name: reader
fields.description: The field for the reader record component.

constructors.name: ModdedPlayPayloadRegistration
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a ModdedPlayPayloadRegistration record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: id
methods.description: Returns the value of the id record component.

methods.name: type
methods.description: Returns the value of the type record component.

methods.name: handler
methods.description: Returns the value of the handler record component.

methods.name: reader
methods.description: Returns the value of the reader record component.
